mapper.select: SELECT BBS_SN AS boardSn,PST_SN AS no, PST_CAT AS cat, PST_TTL AS title, WRITER, PSTG_YMD AS postDate,MDFCN_YMD AS modiDATE, PST_COMP AS isComplete, BBS_SN AS boardSn FROM I_COUN_POSTS WHERE BBS_SN=#{boardNO} AND PST_DEL='1'
